title: Entangle

Level 1 Conjuration Spell

Create a vine surface, slowing down creatures, possibly Entangling them.

3m 18m STR Save Concentration

Entangle is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Entangle is a Lvl 1 Spell from the Conjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Entangle Information

Description: Create a vine surface, slowing down creatures, possibly Entangling them. Entangled creatures cannot move. An ally can use its help action to try and tear away the vines.

Level: Lvl 1 spell School: Conjuration School Casting Time: Action Range: 18m Requires Concentration: Yes Saving Throw: Strength Duration: 10 turns

How to Acquire Entangle

Entangle can be acquired by the following classes: Druid, Ranger Entangle can be cast by using the following Items: ???

Entangle Tips & Notes

Entangled (condition): Attack Rolls against the creature have Advantage, while the creature's Attack Rolls and Dexterity Saving Throws have Disadvantage. Entangled synergizes well with Prone as this in effect "stun-locks" the target given a creature with 0 movement can't stand up.
